DAO

Class UserDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • DAO.UserDAO

  • public class UserDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an User data access object Methods access User table in database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserDAO()
      Empty constructor for Gson compatibility

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Boolean createUser(User user)
      Takes in a Model User object with all information and inserts the information into the database.
      java.lang.Boolean deleteAllUsers()
      Deletes all users from database and returns a true boolean if the request succeeded
      java.lang.Boolean deleteUser(java.lang.String username)
      Takes in a username string to delete a specific user from the database
      User readUser(java.lang.String userName)
      Takes in a userName as a string and checks the database for that user which is the primary key.

    • Method Detail

      • createUser

        public java.lang.Boolean createUser(User user)
        Takes in a Model User object with all information and inserts the information into the database. The function returns true if the method succeeded.
        Parameters:
        user - Model User
        Returns:
        true if the user insert succeeded

      • readUser

        public User readUser(java.lang.String userName)
        Takes in a userName as a string and checks the database for that user which is the primary key. The function returns the User object.
        Parameters:
        userName - String username
        Returns:
        returns Model User if user is found in database

      • deleteAllUsers

        public java.lang.Boolean deleteAllUsers()
        Deletes all users from database and returns a true boolean if the request succeeded
        Returns:
        returns true if the request succeeded

      • deleteUser

        public java.lang.Boolean deleteUser(java.lang.String username)
        Takes in a username string to delete a specific user from the database
        Parameters:
        username - string is passed in
        Returns:
        Returns a true boolean if the user was deleted
